extends java.lang.Object

      • init

        public void init(int x,
                 int y,
                 double speed,
                 double damage)
        Initiate the Projectile moving
        Parameters:
        x - The initial X co-ordinate of the Projectile
        y - The initial Y co-ordinate of the Projectile
        speed - The speed of the Projectile
        damage - The damage of the Projectile

      • isOutOfScreen

        private boolean isOutOfScreen()
        Returns whether the Projectile is out of the screen bounds or not
        Returns:
        true if the Projectile is out of the screen bounds, false if the Projectile if not out of the screen bounds

      • isColliding

        public boolean isColliding(int x,
                           int y,
                           int width,
                           int height)
        Check if an objects X & Y co-ordinates or width & height overlaps the Projectiles X & Y co-ordinates, or width & height
        Parameters:
        x - The X co-ordinate of the object to check
        y - The Y co-ordinate of the object to check
        width - The width of the object to check
        height - The height of the object to check
        Returns:
        true if the values overlap, false if the values do not overlap

        public boolean isAlive()
